name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mickey Santos COLON, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mickey Santos COLON, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 19th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Motion for Leave to File Amended or Supplemental Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
158 A.3d 66
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Mickey Santos COLON, Petitioner
No. 769 MAL 2015
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
September 19, 2016
